input_args.text: 'U.S. Army Veteran: ‘I Killed Four People In One Hour In Iraq’ Posted on Nov 3, 2016 \nFirst filmed in 2008, Isaac Lebonte, known as ‘Bone’ to his fellow soldiers in Iraq, talks eight years later about killing people in his first firefight, the deaths of close friends and his difficulty adjusting to life outside of war. \nThe interviews were filmed by the award-winning photographer Sean Smith.'
